headline: CIEN Q4 Earnings Crush Estimates on Record Sales, AI Trends Lift Stock
summary: Ciena posts strong fiscal Q4 2025 results with surging optical demand, a $5B backlog and raised 2026 outlook, sending shares sharply higher.
